statements: SELECT * FROM RiskMetrics;
SELECT stock_symbol, trading_strategy, buy_quantity, sell_quantity FROM RiskMetrics;
SELECT id, trade_timestamp, risk_score FROM RiskMetrics WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT id, trading_strategy, trade_timestamp, risk_score FROM RiskMetrics WHERE risk_score > 0.5 ORDER BY trade_timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, stock_symbol, trading_strategy, trade_timestamp, buy_quantity, sell_quantity, risk_score FROM RiskMetrics WHERE buy_quantity > sell_quantity ORDER BY risk_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM RiskMetrics WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT id, stock_symbol, trade_timestamp FROM RiskMetrics WHERE buy_quantity > 100 AND sell_quantity < 50 ORDER BY trade_timestamp DESC;
SELECT AVG(risk_score) as avg_risk_score, trading_strategy FROM RiskMetrics GROUP BY trading_strategy HAVING COUNT(*) > 10 ORDER BY avg_risk_score DESC;
SELECT stock_symbol, SUM(buy_quantity) as total_buy_quantity, SUM(sell_quantity) as total_sell_quantity FROM RiskMetrics GROUP BY stock_symbol HAVING total_buy_quantity > total_sell_quantity;
SELECT MAX(trade_timestamp) as latest_trade_timestamp, MIN(trade_timestamp) as oldest_trade_timestamp FROM RiskMetrics;
SELECT * FROM RiskMetrics WHERE symbol='AAPL'
SELECT id, symbol, timestamp FROM RiskMetrics ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT id, symbol, alpha FROM RiskMetrics WHERE beta > 0.5
SELECT * FROM TradingAlgorithms WHERE name LIKE 'Trend%'
SELECT id, strategy, parameters FROM TradingAlgorithms
SELECT * FROM RiskMetrics WHERE id = 10 ORDER BY symbol ASC
SELECT symbol, alpha FROM RiskMetrics WHERE beta > 0.5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT DISTINCT symbol FROM RiskMetrics
SELECT * FROM TradingAlgorithms WHERE name LIKE '%AI%'
SELECT id, name, strategy FROM TradingAlgorithms WHERE parameters->>'risk_level' = 'high' ORDER BY id
SELECT id, symbol, timestamp, volatility FROM RiskMetrics;
SELECT symbol, timestamp, volatility, id FROM RiskMetrics;
SELECT * FROM TradeOrders WHERE order_type='buy';
SELECT symbol, quantity, price FROM TradeOrders WHERE order_type='sell';
SELECT id, symbol, return, sharpe_ratio, benchmark_return FROM PerformanceMetrics;
SELECT id, symbol, timestamp, volatility FROM RiskMetrics WHERE symbol = 'AAPL'
SELECT symbol, MAX(volatility) AS max_volatility FROM RiskMetrics GROUP BY symbol
SELECT * FROM TradeOrders WHERE quantity > 100 AND price < 50.00 ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT symbol, SUM(return) AS total_return FROM PerformanceMetrics GROUP BY symbol HAVING total_return > 0
SELECT * FROM RiskMetrics JOIN TradeOrders ON RiskMetrics.symbol = TradeOrders.symbol
SELECT * FROM risk_metrics;
SELECT symbol, risk_value FROM risk_metrics ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM trading_strategies WHERE strategy_name = 'Trend Following';
SELECT symbol, executed_price, quantity FROM trade_executions WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY executed_price ASC, execution_timestamp DESC;
SELECT symbol, log_message FROM trade_logs WHERE log_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND log_timestamp < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM risk_metrics ORDER BY symbol ASC, timestamp DESC;
SELECT symbol, risk_value FROM risk_metrics WHERE risk_value > 100 ORDER BY risk_value DESC;
SELECT symbol, COUNT(*) as total_trades FROM trade_executions GROUP BY symbol HAVING total_trades > 5;

SELECT t.symbol, te.executed_price, tl.log_message FROM trading_strategies t JOIN trade_executions te ON t.strategy_id = te.strategy_id JOIN trade_logs tl ON te.execution_id = tl.execution_id WHERE t.strategy_name = 'Trend Following' ORDER BY te.execution_timestamp DESC;
SELECT t.symbol, avg(r.risk_value) as avg_risk FROM trading_strategies t JOIN risk_metrics r ON t.symbol = r.symbol GROUP BY t.symbol HAVING avg_risk < 200;
SELECT * FROM RiskMetrics;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM RiskMetrics WHERE id = 1;
SELECT instrument_name, exchange_name, sector FROM TradedInstruments WHERE instrument_id = 3;
SELECT algorithm_id, algorithm_name, algorithm_type FROM TradingAlgorithms ORDER BY algorithm_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM HistoricalData WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM RiskMetrics WHERE metric_value > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT algorithm_id, algorithm_name, algorithm_type FROM TradingAlgorithms WHERE algorithm_type = 'Trend Following' ORDER BY algorithm_name ASC;
SELECT instrument_name, exchange_name, sector FROM TradedInstruments WHERE sector = 'Technology' AND exchange_name = 'NASDAQ' ORDER BY instrument_name;
SELECT * FROM TradeExecution WHERE execution_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' ORDER BY volume DESC;

SELECT instrument_name, price, volume_traded FROM TradedInstruments INNER JOIN HistoricalData ON TradedInstruments.instrument_id = HistoricalData.instrument_id WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY volume_traded DESC LIMIT 5;
